tool.name: HuBMAP Trim Reads
tool.description: Trim single-cell FASTQ reads with assay-specific settings
tool.command: id && working="\$(pwd)" && mkdir "\${working}/trim/" && mkdir "\${working}/adj/" && cp "$orig_R1_fastq" "\${working}/trim/Sample_X_S1_L001_R1_001.fastq.gz" && cp "$orig_R2_fastq" "\${working}/trim/Sample_X_S1_L001_R2_001.fastq.gz" && python3 /opt/trim_reads.py ${assay} ./adj/ ./trim/ -p ${threads} && ls -lR "\${working}" && cp "\${working}/trimmed/1/Sample_X_S1_L001_R1_001.fastq.gz" "$trim_R1_fastq" && cp "\${working}/trimmed/1/Sample_X_S1_L001_R2_001.fastq.gz" "$trim_R2_fastq"
tool.help: Runs the HuBMAP trimming script to prepare FASTQ pairs for quantification.
